title: NATIONAL: CONSENSUS SURVEYS
instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through the advertisements in this book.
Please take as much time with each ad as you need to. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses, you'll need them.
HAND RESPONDENT PORTFOLIO AND TAKE IT BACK BEFORE CONTINUING.

questions.text: Now I'd like to ask you a few questions about the ads in the book. What brands or products do you remember seeing ads for in the book? Please specify any other brands.
questions.note: DO NOT READ EITHER BRAND NAMES OR PRODUCT CATEGORIES

questions.text: Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?

follow_up.condition: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK
follow_up.text: What brands do you remember seeing ads for? Any others?

follow_up.condition: IF ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ASK
follow_up.text: Do you remember any ads for any other brands of cigarettes?
